DOC.brief_title: Randomized Clinical Trial Of Bococizumab ( PF-04950615 ; RN316 ) In Subjects With Hyperlipidemia Or Mixed Dyslipidemia At Risk Of Cardiovascular Events
DOC.criteria: Treated statin . Fasting LDLC > 70 mg/dL triglyceride < =400 mg/dL . High high risk incur cardiovascular event . Pregnant breastfeeding female . Cardiovascular cerebrovascular event procedure past 30 day . Congestive heart failure NYHA class IV . Poorly control hypertension .
